content: With this area accessed, now you need to  through the majority of Chapter 3 - The New West, until you step off Turtle Island within Bitter Lake. Once off the island and at the North Shore Shrine, head to your left, along the coastline to find Chen Loong.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Ebon_Flow.md', within the main section titled 'Ebon Flow', specifically from the subsection '**Black Myth: Wukong Ebon Flow Location**'.
The content is as follows:
With this area accessed, now you need to  through the majority of Chapter 3 - The New West, until you step off Turtle Island within Bitter Lake. Once off the island and at the North Shore Shrine, head to your left, along the coastline to find Chen Loong.
